"Blessed are the merciful: for they shall 
 obtain mercy." Matthew 5:7. 


     The heart of man is by nature cold and dark and unloving; whenever one manifests a spirit of mercy and forgiveness, he does it not of himself, but through 
                                                                           22
the influence of the divine Spirit moving upon his heart. "We love, because He first loved us." 1 John 4:19, R.V.
